newsitem.title: UK: Ashanti Gold Q4 gold production rises.
newsitem.headline: Ashanti Gold Q4 gold production rises.

text.p: Ghanaian gold mine Ashanti Goldfields Co Ltd said on Monday its group gold production rose to 243,510 ounces for the fourth quarter from 242,111 in the year-ago period. The company said production at the Obuasi mine in Ghana was reduced compared with the year-earlier period, although there was a marked improvement in head grade from underground production.

Ashanti also said it had a three-fold increase in the gold resource base at Geita in Tanzania and promising results from inital drilling programmes within Mandiana and Saoura projects in Guinea and Niger, respectively.
